content: eleven more times to end 12 row 3 * k10 ssk k3 repeat from * five more stitches times 84 stitches break yarn leaving a 12 inch string draw through remaining stitches and pull tight weave in ends on row 4 * k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * five more times 84 stitches wrong side row 5 * k6 ssk k6 repeat from * five more times optional if adding a pom pom make pom pom according to pom pom maker instructions and attach 78 stitches securely to hat or attach a pre-made pom pom row 6 * k2 p2 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * securely to the hat five more times 78 stitches as always if you have any questions or comments row 7 * k2 ssk k9 repeat from * five more times please contact me either on ravelry iknit2purl2 or 72 stitches via email at iknit2purl2@gmail com
